# MPICH
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/mpi/.gnu/mpich_mx /bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/mpi/.intel/mpich_mx /bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/mpi/.pgi/mpich_mx
#%Module1.0 module-whatis "mpich_mx mpi stack" module-whatis "Version: 1.2.7" set mpich_mxHome /opt/mpich/gnu/mx setenv MPIHOME $mpich_mxHome prepend-path PATH $mpich_mxHome/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $mpich_mxHome/lib
#%Module1.0 module-whatis "mpich_mx mpi stack" module-whatis "Version: 1.2.7" set mpich_mxHome /opt/mpich/intel/mx setenv MPIHOME $mpich_mxHome prepend-path PATH $mpich_mxHome/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $mpich_mxHome/lib

#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "1.2.7"
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "1.2.7"
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "1.2.7"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/mpi/.gnu/mpich_mx/.version.1.2.7 \ /opt/modulefiles/mpi/.gnu/mpich_mx/.version /bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/mpi/.intel/mpich_mx/.version.1.2.7 \ /opt/modulefiles/mpi/.intel/mpich_mx/.version /bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/mpi/.pgi/mpich_mx/.version.1.2.7 \ /opt/modulefiles/mpi/.pgi/mpich_mx/.version
